title: 114_s2492
content: Encouraging Americans to Save Act This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the tax credit for retirement savings contributions to: (1) make such credit refundable. (2) allow individual taxpayers who have attained age 18 as of the close of the taxable year a credit for 50 of their retirement savings contributions up to $1,000. (3) increase the maximum income threshold for determining eligibility for the credit. And (4) allow direct deposit of credit amounts into the taxpayer's retirement savings vehicle . The Department of the Treasury shall educate taxpayers on the benefits of the credit for retirement savings contributions.
